publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5192 Dr Richard Simpson: StAnza’s Virtual Poetry Festival, the Fife Poetry Festival Online—That the Parliament welcomes StAnza’s first virtual poetry festival, a free event that, on Saturday 14 November 2009, will be linking up poets and poetry from 12 cities and towns across the world from Mumbai to Sacramento and streaming them live into the Byre Theatre, St Andrews and also via webcasts worldwide, making St Andrews, Fife and Scotland the hub of this international focus, online at http://stanzapoetry.org/virtual-festival.php, and wishes this innovative festival every success.

S3M-5192 Dr Richard Simpson: StAnza’s Virtual Poetry Festival, the Fife Poetry Festival Online—That the Parliament welcomes StAnza’s first virtual poetry festival, a free event that, on Saturday 14 November 2009, will be linking up poets and poetry from 12 cities and towns across the world from Mumbai to Sacramento and streaming them live into the Byre Theatre, St Andrews and also via webcasts worldwide, making St Andrews, Fife and Scotland the hub of this international focus, online at http://stanzapoetry.org/virtual-festival.php, and wishes this innovative festival every success.
S3M-5192 StAnza’s Virtual Poetry Festival, the Fife Poetry Festival Online (lodged on 12 November 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-5192 StAnza’s Virtual Poetry Festival, the Fife Poetry Festival Online (lodged on 12 November 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
